meaningMnemonic:
If you <kanji>change</kanji> something then <kanji>exchange</kanji> it, you are making a <vocabulary>conversion</vocabulary> or a <vocabulary>change</vocabulary>.

変換 generally refers to converting something from one form to another, like data conversion, energy transformation, or even converting hiragana to kanji.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
